snippet: An activist group asked a court to review a deal struck in 2010 between Goldman Sachs and British tax authorities that allowed the firm to avoid as much as $31 million in interest on unpaid taxes.
abstract: An activist group asked a court to review a deal struck in 2010 between Goldman Sachs and British tax authorities that allowed the firm to avoid as much as $31 million in interest on unpaid taxes.

headline.main: British Activists Press Tax Case Involving Goldman Sachs
